parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filter to determine the list of User IDs to return. (dict) --- Used to streamline results of a search based on the property being filtered. The property being filtered. For example, UserId. The property values to filter on. For example, 'user-123'. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The property being filtered. For example, UserId.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The property values to filter on. For example, 'user-123'.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the user status. Can be 'active', 'modifying' or 'deleting'.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The options are valkey or redis.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum engine version required, which is Redis OSS 6.0

nested_items.name: AccessString
nested_items.description: Access permissions string used for this user.

nested_items.name: UserGroupIds
nested_items.description: Returns a list of the user group IDs the user belongs to.

nested_items.name: Authentication
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the user requires a password to authenticate.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user requires a password to authenticate.

nested_items.name: PasswordCount
nested_items.description: The number of passwords belonging to the user. The maximum is two.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional marker returned from a prior request. Use this marker for pagination of results from this operation. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords. >
